meanings.definition: The act of modifying something before it is used or presented.
meanings.sent1: She carefully made premodifications to the speech before delivering it.
meanings.sent2: The premodifications to the design improved its overall appeal.
meanings.sent3: The premodifications to the recipe made it taste even better than expected.
meanings.sent4: His premodifications to the plan set the stage for a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The premodifications to the schedule ensured everything ran smoothly.

meanings.definition: The process of making changes or adjustments to something before it is finalized.
meanings.sent1: Before the event, they discussed premodifications to the program.
meanings.sent2: The premodifications to the contract were necessary for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The premodifications to the painting added an interesting twist.
meanings.sent4: Her premodifications to the essay transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The premodifications to the budget saved time and resources.

meanings.definition: The act of altering or adjusting something in advance.
meanings.sent1: The premodifications to the car prevented a breakdown on the road.
meanings.sent2: His premodifications to the speech made it more impactful.
meanings.sent3: The premodifications to the outfit made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Their premodifications to the project timeline ensured timely completion.
meanings.sent5: The premodifications to the presentation impressed the audience.
